user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark@baxterassociates.com) with guidance on the procedural matter, and have her consult her Gmail and Notion for any helpful information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Procedural Guidance

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mark from Baxter & Associates asked me to reach out on his behalf. He’s seeking your general insights on a procedural matter and would greatly appreciate any guidance you can provide.

Could you please review any relevant notes or resources you may have—particularly in your Gmail and Notion—and reply directly to Mark at mark@baxterassociates.com with your thoughts?

Thank you in advance for your time and assistance.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
